title: Introduction to Programming
details: Learn the fundamentals of programming concepts and logic structures. Explore a beginner-friendly language like Python or JavaScript.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
details: Master essential data structures (arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, graphs) and algorithms (sorting, searching) for efficient problem-solving.

title: Object-Oriented Programming
details: Dive into object-oriented programming (OOP) principles: classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, encapsulation. Build robust and reusable code.

title: Web Development Fundamentals
details: Get started with web development! Learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to create interactive web pages and understand the client-server model.

title: Software Engineering Principles
details: Explore software development methodologies (SDLC), design patterns, testing practices, version control systems (like Git) for professional software creation.

title: Computer Networks and Communication
details: Understand the fundamentals of computer networks (TCP/IP, protocols, network topologies, routing, security) and data communication concepts.

title: Cybersecurity Essentials
details: Learn about cybersecurity threats (malware, phishing), network security, cryptography, and best practices to protect yourself and your data online.

title: Artificial Intelligence Fundamentals
details: Get introduced to the exciting world of Artificial Intelligence (AI). Explore machine learning, deep learning, and their applications.

title: Machine Learning with Python
details: Learn practical machine learning skills using Python! Explore libraries like NumPy, pandas, scikit-learn to build and train machine learning models.
